model_info.name: test_pcg
model_info.title: PCG (Preconditioned Conjugate Gradient) Solver Demonstration
model_info.description: Comprehensive demonstration of MODFLOW's PCG solver package, showing solver configuration, performance optimization, and preconditioning methods for large-scale groundwater models.

learning_objectives: Understand PCG solver principles and applications
Configure PCG solver parameters for optimal performance
Optimize solver settings for different problem types
Apply PCG to large-scale groundwater modeling

BAS.purpose: Basic package with complex boundary conditions

LPF.purpose: Layer Property Flow with heterogeneous hydraulic conductivity

OC.purpose: Output control for heads and budgets

1_grid_generation.educational_focus: Large grid systems for PCG demonstration

2_model_setup.description: Multi-layer aquifer system with heterogeneous properties
2_model_setup.educational_focus: Heterogeneous K distribution for solver testing

3_initial_conditions.description: Hydraulic head distribution with boundary gradients

4_boundary_conditions.description: Constant heads, pumping wells, and areal recharge
4_boundary_conditions.educational_focus: Complex boundary conditions for solver challenges

5_solver.description: PCG solver with optimized preconditioning settings

6_visualization.description: Head and budget output for solver performance analysis

7_post_processing.description: Solver performance analysis and convergence assessment

professional_applications: Regional groundwater modeling with large grid systems
Urban water supply and wellfield optimization
Coastal aquifer management and saltwater intrusion
Climate change impact assessment on groundwater
Water rights analysis and drawdown interference studies

file_structure.test_results.json: Model execution results and performance metrics

technical_notes.solver_selection: PCG is ideal for large models (>10,000 cells) due to memory efficiency
technical_notes.preconditioning: Modified Incomplete Cholesky (NPCOND=1) provides best general performance
technical_notes.convergence: Optimized settings balance speed and reliability
technical_notes.memory_usage: PCG uses significantly less memory than direct solvers

qa_information.testing_notes: Tests PCG solver configuration and file format compatibility
